overview: Year 2052. It is night. A car travels along desolate roads. Inside there is a Middle Eastern family (father, mother and daughter) the Italian boyfriend of the daughter. A police car follow the family and it makes them stop in a cultivated field. The policeman goes out and joins them. Apply for license and registration. He has racists and violent behavior towards the family man who is driving. The policeman returns to his car to check the datas and he comes back.
title: Europa '52
